author: Nik Brooks
comment: I have your other watch face and I gave a great review, however this face has no customisations and that is a shame. Please add some options such as colours and position of features and the ability to resize elements and I will push this to 5 stars.
title: Not what I expected

author: Shane McGowan
comment: I own both the red and blue variant of this watch face and they both look great on my G Watch.
title: Beautiful Face

author: BobbyEcon
comment: No custom ability. I bought the other app and it has a lot of adjustments and tweaks. None of that here. I'll stick with it in hopes that it gets an update or 2
title: Nice but...

author: Kenneth Gibson
comment: I love this watch face. It has cool animations when the screen lights up. Only thing I would like is the option to change the face saying Pujie on it. Thanks,

reply.author: Pujie
reply.content: Thanks so much for your review! I'll think about if I want to leave the brand name optional. But for now, I hope you can get used to the word Pujie..

title: Great watch face

author: Meike Morren
comment: Very good looking watch face, runs well on my moto 360. Love that it displays the battery status and the date! And very easy to install since it requires no additional apps. Keep up the good work!
title: Striking Watch Face

comment: The ambient mode doesn't read well at all
title: Bad Ambient Mode

comment: But it needs the editor like the other watch face
title: I like it
